DOC.brief_summary: Obstructive Sleep Apnea may cause dizziness or vertigo through hypoxia of the vestibular nuclei in the brain. Treating sleep apnea may improve dizziness or vertigo.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Obstructive Sleep Apnea Treatment on Dizziness, Vertigo
DOC.criteria: Over 18 years old Diagnosed with Sleep Apnea DHI score equals or over 16 points Pregnant women Patients diagnosed with mental diseases Patients taking antivertigo medications Patients after CVA or with peripheral neuropathy Patients who suffered severe head trauma Patients with chronic renal failure Patients with malignancy at the time of the study
